korean: 길 가다가 우연히 중학교 동창을 만났다.
처음엔 못 알아봤는데 이름을 듣고 깜짝 놀랐어.
그동안 어떻게 지냈는지 서로 근황을 물어봤어.
친구는 대학 졸업하고 지금 회사 다니고 있대.
중학교 때 장난치던 일이랑 선생님들 얘기하면서 웃었어.
시간이 많이 흘렀다는 게 실감 났어.
연락처 주고받고 다음에 또 만나기로 했어.
옛날 친구 만나니까 추억도 생각나고 좋았어.
이렇게 우연히 만나는 것도 인연인 것 같아.
english: I ran into a middle school classmate by chance on the street.
It was, like, totally random, so it was interesting.
I didn't recognize them at first, but was surprised when I heard their name.
Their face had changed so much that I had no idea.
We talked briefly at a nearby cafe.
We asked each other what we'd been up to.
My friend said they graduated from college and are working at a company now.
It felt strange talking about old memories.
We laughed while talking about the pranks we pulled in middle school and stories about our teachers.
I think we were really immature back then.
I really felt how much time has passed.
We exchanged contact information and decided to meet again next time.
Meeting an old friend brought back memories and felt good.
I think running into each other like this is pretty much fate.
